description: EU trade commissioner Phil Hogan was under pressure over his attendance at a golf dinner.
title: EU trade commissioner Phil Hogan resigns over 'Covid breach'
title_page: EU trade commissioner Phil Hogan resigns over 'Covid breach' - BBC News
maintext: Mr Hogan - who would have been leading the EU's post-Brexit free trade negotiations with the UK - had been facing calls to quit in the wake of #GolfGate, as it has become known in Ireland.
